segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is facing the sink area, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets are ajar, revealing the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is positioned on a two-step stool, body extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is inside the jar, the other clutching a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, indicating instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl stands with her arm raised toward the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet, filling and overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over the front, wetting the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a tidy garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and hazards inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
